name: Todo App
description: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle.

name: beuty salon website
description: This is a website for a beuty salon that i design with Figma, it has a responsive design and i made it with React, React Router, javaScript and CSS.It show the services, contact info and a map of the salon's location.

name: My Portfolio
description:
My own portfolio! I designed it with a responsive layout and a good accesibility according with the w3c.
I made it with React, CSS, JavaScript and HTML and unit testing with Jest.For the form i used the services of Netlify.

name: Url Shortering
description: This is a url shortering that use an API to generate the results, is a challenge from frontendmentor.io. To make this project i used React, JavaScript, CSS and for unit tests i used Jest.

name: Crowdfunding page
description: This project is a demo page for a crowdfunding website using responsive design without using any framework, is a challenge from frontendmentor.io, it have a interaction between the doom and the user input, to make this project i used JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

name: tips calculator
description: This project is a frontendmentor.io challenge is a tips calculator with a responsive layout. i used JavaScript, CSS and HTML to make this project.

name: Bill App
description: This project is a desktop app, is a bill software designed by me and it use a relational data base with SQLite ad OOP. It has various modules to manage products, clients and invoices also it has a UI for the cashier where him can create new invoices and add or edit client's information.
